root.name: Wonder Boy
root.description: GameplayThe gameplay in Wonder Boy is traditional platforming fare, tasking players with navigating their way to the end of each level which would entail correctly timing jumps and either defeating enemies using throwing axes or avoiding them entirely.Â Wonder Boy could collect items, such as fruit, which were scattered throughout the levels to increase their score. Whilst Wonder Boy would begin his journey on foot, players could often navigate them on via a skateboard, should the correct item be collected.
